answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the collection of personal data from various sources.
reply.reference: We may collect a variety of information from or about you or your devices... In this Privacy Policy, “Personal Information” means any information relating to an identified or identifiable individual. URL: https://www.yojo.co/privacy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects information about interactions with the services, including viewed pages or content, conducted searches, followed people, purchases, comments, posted content, and visit dates and times.

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the section that specifies the information collected about interactions with the services.
reply.reference: We automatically receive information about your interactions with our Services, like the pages or other content you view, the searches you conduct, people you follow, purchases you make, your comments, any content you post, and the dates and times of your visits. URL: https://www.yojo.co/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can revise, modify, or delete their account information, and also provides instructions on how to block Cookies, withdraw consent, and exercise various rights related to personal information processing, including deleting or anonymizing data.
reply.reference: You can revise, modify, or delete your account information. URL: https://www.yojo.co/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may disclose your Personal Information to third parties in certain circumstances, such as vendors and service providers, user content, analytics partners, and in situations required by law or for corporate transactions.
reply.reference: Except as described in this Policy, we will not disclose your Personal Information that we collect on the Services to third parties without your consent. We may disclose your Personal Information to third parties if you consent to us doing so, as well as in the following circumstances: Vendors and Service Providers. We may share any Personal Information we receive with vendors and service providers retained in connection with the provision of our Services. User Content. You can see, schedule, and attend online classes through our Services. Some of your profile information may be viewable by other users. Analytics Partners. We use analytics services such as Google Analytics to collect and process certain analytics data. These services may also collect information about your use of other websites, apps, and online resources. URL: https://www.yojo.co/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: Vendors, service providers, analytics partners, as required by law, in case of mergers, sales, or asset transfers, and with consent.

content: In case of mergers, sales, or asset transfers

reply.analysis: The app shares data with multiple categories of third parties as outlined in the privacy policy document.
reply.reference: Vendors and Service Providers. We may share any Personal Information we receive with vendors and service providers retained in connection with the provision of our Services. Analytics Partners. We use analytics services such as Google Analytics to collect and process certain analytics data. As Required By Law and Similar Disclosures. We may access, preserve, and disclose your Personal Information if we believe doing so is required or appropriate. Merger, Sale, or Other Asset Transfers. We may transfer your Personal Information to service providers, advisors, potential transactional partners, or other third parties. Consent. We may also disclose your Personal Information with your permission. URL: https://www.yojo.co/privacy
